nodes.text: An Imperial-controlled house on the Twin World of Talus was guarded by the Galactic Empire during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was notably guarded by a number of stormtrooper riflemen. The house was located in a ridge, just southwest of Lake Bondoma. The front porch of the house was decorated with a pot of purple flowers. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, these flowers were collected by a spacer, despite the objections of the stormtroopers.
